channel.title: CVE Feed for easyii -- CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for easyii -- CMS

item.title: CVE-2020-36534|2024-08-04T17:30:08.327Z -- easyii -- cms
item.description: A vulnerability was found in easyii CMS. It has been classified as problematic. Affected is an unknown function of the file /admin/sign/out. The manipulation leads to cross site request forgery. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
